assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Alglucosidase_Alpha_Renewal_Disease_Information_Q3
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: 3. Current ventilatory status, does the patient require :
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: a. Does not require ventilatory support b. Non-invasive ventilatory support when asleep c. Non-invasive ventilatory support when asleep and awake but <24 hours/day d. Non-invasive ventilatory support 24 hours/day e. Invasive ventilatory support required
